name: Zelda-Like Dungeon
description:
A very simple dungeon in the style of the GameBoy Zelda games. This is just a small prototype I did to practice making this style of game. I'll be working on an original top-down dungeon crawler soon!

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys
Attack: Space Bar

*Thanks to fornclake for the great tutorials and to Retro-Dragon for the art!
